description: Episode of Series "Chequerboard". The Gordons, with their four children, are migrating from England to australia. This film interviews the Gordons in England and hears of their hopes and dreams. It then spends the first six months in Australia with the family to find out the reality. Reporters: Richard Oxenburgh, Robert Higson.
